title: Logo font for Landscape and Irrigation Supply Company
content:
I looked through my entire font library to identify this font, but came up empty. Would appreciate your help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [irrigation.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024061235/http:/typophile.com/files/irrigation.jpg) | 22.33 KB |
author: ASGrant

comments.content: Thank you! There is no way I would have ever identified it.

The good ol' Dafont\>Techno\>scifi strikes again!

- Mike Yanega
